description: Situated in the heart of Brera and refurbished in the autumn of 2019, this restaurant showcases Italian artisanal skills through its bespoke furnishings, creating a fine setting for Canzian’s superb cuisine. A great choice for anyone looking for classic Italian dishes plus a few more inventive options, all of which are prepared using the very best ingredients. Simpler fare available at lunchtime.
